item.title: Update ref No 8279103, 21st October
item.description:
The issue of vehicles blocking the parallel crossing at Goldsmsmith Road cannot be Closed,the problem continues every school day , will someone have to be seriously injured before you fix it ???
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Goldsmith Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
